channel.title: High alching (real way)
channel.description: I need a code for high alching the real way, so that once you high alch something it goes back to your magic spell book instead of staying at your inventory, so you don't have to keep clicking inv. slot after you alch something. THANKS!

item.title: High alching (real way)
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

This should be posted in the Development/Help section instead, and just to answer your question;

Declare this method in your client class;

public void setSidebarMage() { try { outStream.createFrame(106); outStream.writeByteC(6); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } catch(Exception E) { sendMessage("Error switching sidebar back to the interface!"); } }

Now in your High alch spell, where it is adding the amount of gold of the item you alched into your inventory, add this;

                        setSidebarMage();

This will switch you back to the Magic spellbook while completing the High alch spell.

Read full topic
